sect2.title: Installation of Gzip
sect2.para: The following patch fixes a buffer overflow that occurs when a filename is longer than 1020 characters. It does this by inserting a check that the buffer is large enough for the given filename. The program exits with the message "Filename too long" if the buffer is not large enough.
Change the default installation directory for Gzip so it will be installed in the /bin directory:
Move the Gzip binaries to the /bin directory:

screen.userinput: mv /usr/bin/gzip /bin && rm /usr/bin/{gunzip,zcat} && ln -s gzip /bin/gunzip && ln -s gzip /bin/zcat && ln -s gunzip /bin/uncompress
